snippet.title: Castlehold - Available Now (Steam) Trailer
snippet.description:
Try Castlehold for FREE on Steam today!
Steam: https://bit.ly/2ZVbnyL 
Discord: https://discord.gg/castlehold

Castlehold is an innovative competitive strategy game, featuring the new Active Resource Control (ARC) System. Build your Army, lead your troops into Battle and see how you stack up against your opponent in fast-paced, strategic combat.

Recruit Squads of randomized Soldiers or directly acquire up to 4 daily Units not currently in your collection – all with the currency you’ve gained from Leveling Up and completing Quests. Win or lose, you’ll gain XP and earn currency rewards when you Level Up.

GAME FEATURES
- Simple to learn, but difficult to master strategies
- Command 5 Free Captains across 4 Free Battlefields
- 300 Early Access Soldiers in Total (150x2)
- 60 Soldiers unlocked when you start (30x2)
- Ranked Ladder, Casual Play, and Friend Play Modes
- No class-based Army restrictions, mix and match your Units your way!
- More Modes and Additional Troops to come!

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1425410/Castlehold/

Follow us:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/5thcell
Facebook: https://facebook.com/5thcell
https://discord.gg/castlehold

Visit Us: 
http://PlayCastlehold.com
